sense.gloss: free, unrestricted, (with) complete mastery, completely in control

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑秘書↑↓ひしょ↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓が↑自由自在↑↓|じゆうじざい|↓だ。
sdata.e: My secretary has a good command of the English language.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓を↑自由自在↑↓|じゆうじざい|↓に↑話↑↓はな↓せる。
sdata.e: He has a good command of English.
